title: Cinder in your eye
creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Phillip Mark-Law
brief_description: An atmospheric and poetic treatment of the restoration of railway engines accompanied by the natural sounds and music of the banjo and harmonica. Locomotives and historic rolling stock once again reign in Tasmania’s superb countryside in this journey into nostalgia.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Phillip Mark-Law
